00025 require_once 'PHPUnit2/Framework/TestSuite.php';
00026 require_once 'PHPUnit2/Util/TestDox/ResultPrinter/HTML.php';
00027 chdir ('../../');
00028 require_once 'core/tests/testoutput.php';
00029 
00030 class MorgOSSuit extends PHPUnit2_Framework_TestSuite {
00031 
00032         function MorgOSSuit () {
00033                 $this->setUp ();
00034         }
00035 
00036         function setUp () {
00037                 global $dbModule;
00038                 include_once ('core/varia.functions.php');
00039                 include_once ('core/databasemanager.functions.php');
00040                 $testerOptions = parse_ini_file ('core/tests/options.ini');
00041                 $dbModule = databaseLoadModule ($testerOptions['dbModule']);
00042                 if (isError ($dbModule)) {
00043                         die ('Can\'t load database module, check your settings.');
00044                 }
00045                 $r = $dbModule->connect ($testerOptions['dbHost'], $testerOptions['dbUser'], $testerOptions['dbPass']);
00046                 if (isError ($r)) {
00047                         die ('Can\' connect to database, check your settings.');
00048                 }
00049                 $r = $dbModule->selectDatabase ($testerOptions['dbDatabaseName']);
00050                 if (isError ($r)) {
00051                         die ('Wrong databasename, check your settings.');
00052                 }
00053                 
00054                 global $avModules;
00055                 $availableModulesINI = explode (',', $testerOptions['dbAvailableModules']);
00056                 foreach ($availableModulesINI as $value) {
00057                         $avModules[$value] = null;
00058                 }
00059         
00060                 $this->setName ('MorgOS automated Tester: results');
00061                 $this->addTestFile ('core/tests/databasemanager.functions.test.php');
00062                 $this->addTestFile ('core/tests/usermanager.class.test.php');
00063 
00064                 $result = new PHPUnit2_Framework_TestResult;
00065                 $result->addListener(new SimpleTestListener);
00066 
00067                 $this->run ($result);
00068         }
00069 
00070 }
00071 
00072 $suite = new MorgOSSuit ();
00073 
00074 ?>
